text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One evening...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I come across Mejiro McQueen<n>studying in the cafeteria
late at night.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So if I were to substitute this formula<n>here... That makes
sense.
choice_data_list: Do you have a test coming up?
Do you have a test coming up?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer! Yes, there's a short quiz<n>tomorrow. I thought
that I would<n>conduct a quick review.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I was having a few difficulties,<n>however, which is why I'm
still here.
choice_data_list:
Maybe we should reduce the training load
tomorrow?

Maybe we should reduce the training load
tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, there's no need to do that. As<n>a Mejiro, I am
accustomed to<n>balancing both mental and physical<n>
discipline.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, I expect the standard<n>regimen at practice
tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As requested, we conduct our training<n>regimen as usual the
next day.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No doubt due to how late she was up<n>studying last night,
McQueen begins to<n>nod off during our post-training<n>
meeting.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
O-of course I am! A Mejiro brings<n>nothing but her full
attention to every<n>interaction!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We were reviewing all of today's<n>training exercises, yes?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Given her condition, I decide it would<n>be best to start things
over one more<n>time. But...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
choice_data_list: You didn't get enough sleep, did you?
You didn't get enough sleep, did you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I-I really wasn't sleeping, dozing, or<n>even dreaming! It must
be your<n>imagination.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please continue. I'm all ears.
choice_data_list: Let's go ahead and call it a day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? But we were in the middle of a<n>meeting...
choice_data_list:
I don't want to push you to the point of
collapsing again.

I don't want to push you to the point of
collapsing again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh... but...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It looks like I've exhibited cause for<n>concern once again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I don't want to cause you any more<n>undue trouble, so let's
wrap it up for<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you as always, Trainer.
choice_data_list: Just be sure to sleep properly, okay?
Just be sure to sleep properly, okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll have you know that I am<n>managing my sleep schedule<n>
perfectly fine!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: AND I was actually paying properattention back there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I must ask that you believe me! I<n>insist!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems much work remains to be<n>done to persuade the
prideful<n>McQueen to acknowledge her limits.
